plot: Travel on a tropical journey from the birth of Jamaica's music to the end of the island's innocence. Without Ska, there is no Reggae.
title: Legends of Ska: Cool & Copasetic
plot_es: Travel on a tropical journey from the birth of Jamaica's music to the end of the island's innocence. Without Ska, there is no Reggae.
plot_en: Travel on a tropical journey from the birth of Jamaica's music to the end of the island's innocence. Without Ska, there is no Reggae.
